title: My family and home town
creator_credit: Gerald Phineasa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Gerald Phineasa loves his family and small community of Bamaga in far North Queensland. His large family have plenty of animals and are starting to race horses and he looks forward to returning from his school break in Brisbane to days of riding and fishing. His town is small but somehow has everything Gerald would want. A loving tribute and a snapshot of a small rural community.
creator_credit_for_label: Gerald Phineasa, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
